homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  var isLoggedInUser = $.jStorage.get('username');
  // if (isLoggedInUser) {

  //   var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
  //     $("#logo-myWNC2").parents("a").css("display", "none");
  //     if ($("#logo-myWNC2").parents("a").css("display") == "none") {
  //       clearInterval(hideInterval);
  //     }
  //   }, 2000);
  // }

  function myFunc() {
    $(".alertItem").css("display", "none");
  }

  /*Nick - Added for push notification registration -start*/
  var deviceToken = $.jStorage.get("deviceID");
  if (deviceToken) {} else {
    var gcmSenderID = "459115189650";
    var push = PushNotification.init({
      android: {
        senderID: gcmSenderID
      },
      browser: {
        pushServiceURL: 'http://push.api.phonegap.com/v1/push'
      },
      ios: {
        alert: "true",
        badge: "true",
        sound: "true"
      },
      windows: {}
    });

    push.on('registration', function(data) {
      var devicePushID = data.registrationId;
      var pushDeviceData = {
        "tenant": MyCampusApp.rootScope.tenant,
        "id": devicePushID,
        "type": device.platform,
        "channel": "all"
      };
      if ($.jStorage.get("deviceID") == null || $.jStorage.get("deviceID") == undefined) {
        var urlAddDevice = "https://push.kryptosmobile.com/kryptosds/push/adddeviceToChannel";
        var xhr = $.ajax({
          url: urlAddDevice,
          dataType: "json",
          type: "POST",
          async: true,
          data: pushDeviceData,
          success: function(resp) {
            $.jStorage.set("deviceID", devicePushID);
          },
          error: function(err) {
            //alert("error");
          }
        });
      }
    });
    push.on('error', function(e) {
      alert("error " + e.message);
    });

    push.on('notification', function(data) {
      navigator.notification.alert(data.message, null, data.title, 'Ok');
    });
  }
  /*Nick -Added for push notification registration -end*/
</script>

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCourses100(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {if (window.device) {$.blockUI();}var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no,hidden=no,enableViewportScale=yes,clearcache=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {$.unblockUI();iabRef.show();        };var iabClose = function(data) {$.unblockUI();iabRef.removeEventListener("exit", iabClose);window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();iabRef.removeEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);};iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}

function pageprocessorPhotos598(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {if (window.device) {$.blockUI();}var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no,hidden=no,enableViewportScale=yes,clearcache=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {$.unblockUI();iabRef.show();        };var iabClose = function(data) {$.unblockUI();iabRef.removeEventListener("exit", iabClose);window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();iabRef.removeEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);};iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideos439VideosDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope,$sce, $window, $location) { var video=$rootScope.videos[$routeParams.index];var videoID=video.id.videoId;var url ="https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/videos?id=" + videoID + "&key=AIzaSyBE0rCslr3MbmEgaPkTTcWd7g96GOTZDto&part=snippet,contentDetails,statistics,status";$http.get(url).success(function(data){$scope.title = data.items[0].snippet.localized.title;$scope.trustSrc = function(){return $sce.trustAsResourceUrl("https://www.youtube.com/embed/" + videoID);};$scope.description = data.items[0].snippet.localized.description;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}).error(function(data){$.unblockUI();});try{var onPause = function(){$("iframe").attr("src", $("iframe").attr("src"));};document.addEventListener("pause", onPause, false);}catch (e){}}
